name: Hypo
Lore: 'Truth drugs like Bavo Six decrease resistance to interrogation. The enormous needle adds psychological pressure, facilitating the interrogation process.',
Text: 'Deploy on your IT-O. Once during each of your control phases, if present with a captive: You may ask one yes-or-no question about cards in opponent''s hand. Opponent must answer truthfully or lose 1 Force. OR May add 1 to Force drain where present.',
